description.value:
Frequency once per minute

You have an ominous presence that unnerves the living. You have learned to harness this sinister aura to your own advantage and can scare your foes with a focused glance. Focus your ill intent at one living creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC, or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure) and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} as long as it's frightened. Once you've used Baleful Gaze against a creature, it's temporarily immune for 24 hours.
